item.title: Watch: Jogulamba Gadwal farmers handcuffed despite bail; Congress govt faces backlash
item.description:
<![CDATA[Watch: Jogulamba Gadwal farmers handcuffed despite bail; Congress govt faces backlash
Twelve farmers protesting an ethanol plant in Telangana were paraded in handcuffs a day after receiving bail, sparking widespread outrage. Visuals of their treatment drew criticism from the public and political parties, especially the BRS, accusing the Congress of humiliation.
By Telangana Today Published Date - 18 June 2025, 06:27 PM
Mahabubnagar: Triggering widespread outrage across Telangana, around 12 fa...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today

item.title: Telangana: BRS condemns handcuffing of protesting farmers at Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Telangana: BRS condemns handcuffing of protesting farmers at Jogulamba Gadwal
BRS working president KT Rama Rao calls the move heinous and unforgivable; demands immediate apology from Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy
By Telangana Today Published Date - 18 June 2025, 05:46 PM
BRS working president KT Rama Rao.
Hyderabad: The BRS has condemned the handcuffing of farmers protesting against an ethanol factory in Pedda Dhanwada, Jogulamba Gadwal district and blamed Chief Minister A Revanth ...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
